pages.text: $(thing)Lava Cats$() are a $(thing)Friendly$() type of Fire Elemental, native to the $(thing)Nether$(). Their body consists entirely of $(item)Lava$() and will turn to $(item)Obsidian$() if they come into contact with $(item)Water$().$(br2)They can be $(thing)Tamed$() by feeding them $(item)Blaze Rods$() and bred using $(item)Blaze Powder$().

pages.name: Lava Cat
pages.drop1: minecraft:obsidian{display: {Lore: ["Dropchance: 70%", "Only if Lava Cat has been turned to Obsidian"]}}
pages.drop2: minecraft:cobblestone{display: {Lore: ["Dropchance: 50%", "Only if Lava Cat has been turned to Obsidian"]}}
